item.title: Creating a Custom Sentinel GCP WAF /Load balancer Data Connector
item.description:
Understanding ARM Templates ARM templates are JSON files that define the resources needed for your applications. They allow for infrastructure as code, making deployment and management more efficient and consistent. By leveraging ARM templates, you can automate the creation and configuration of your Sentinel GCP data connector. Prerequisites Before proceeding, ensure you have:
An active Azure subscription Admin access to both your Azure(Microsoft Sentinel Contributor permissions) and GCP accounts. Basic knowledge of JSON and ARM templates Create a custom table in Azure Sentinel
Creating a Cu...
